<PropertyValue>// ************************************************** // Custom code for BAQReportForm // Created: 5/2/2022 12:21:11 PM // ************************************************** // // REVISION LOG // // eb1 05/02/22 eric blackwelder @ encompass // save filter selections and give to the report // // **************************************************
using System; using System.ComponentModel; using System.Data; using System.Diagnostics; using System.Windows.Forms; using Ice.BO; using Ice.UI; using Ice.Lib; using Ice.Adapters; using Ice.Lib.Customization; using Ice.Lib.ExtendedProps; using Ice.Lib.Framework; using Ice.Lib.Searches; using Ice.UI.FormFunctions;
using Infragistics.Win.UltraWinGrid;
public class Script { // ** Wizard Insert Location - Do Not Remove 'Begin/End Wizard Added Module Level Variables' Comments! ** // Begin Wizard Added Module Level Variables **
private EpiDataView edvReportParam; // End Wizard Added Module Level Variables **
// Add Custom Module Level Variables Here **
//EpiListPickerPanel elpShipToState; ListBox lbShipToState;
public void InitializeCustomCode() { // ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Variable Initialization' lines ** // Begin Wizard Added Variable Initialization
this.baseToolbarsManager.ToolClick += new Infragistics.Win.UltraWinToolbars.ToolClickEventHandler(this.baseToolbarsManager_ToolClick); this.edvReportParam = ((EpiDataView)(this.oTrans.EpiDataViews["ReportParam"]));
// End Wizard Added Variable Initialization
// Begin Wizard Added Custom Method Calls
// End Wizard Added Custom Method Calls CreateShipToStateList();
}
public void DestroyCustomCode() { // ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Object Disposal' lines ** // Begin Wizard Added Object Disposal
this.baseToolbarsManager.ToolClick -= new Infragistics.Win.UltraWinToolbars.ToolClickEventHandler(this.baseToolbarsManager_ToolClick); this.edvReportParam = null;
// End Wizard Added Object Disposal
// Begin Custom Code Disposal
// End Custom Code Disposal }
public void CreateShipToStateList() { Control c1 = csm.GetNativeControlReference("c7289c11-7800-48af-95e8-729b403344a9"); EpiGroupBox grpShipToState = (EpiGroupBox)c1; //ListBox lbShipToState = new ListBox(); lbShipToState = new ListBox(); // lbShipToState.Items.Add("One"); // lbShipToState.Items.Add("Two"); // lbShipToState.Items.Add("Three"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("AL"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("AK"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("AZ"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("AR"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("CA"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("CO"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("CT"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("DE"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("FL"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("GA"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("HI"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("ID"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("IL"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("IN"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("IA"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("KS"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("KY"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("LA"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("ME"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("MD"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("MA"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("MI"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("MN"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("MS"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("MO"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("MT"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("NE"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("NV"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("NH"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("NJ"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("NM"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("NY"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("NC"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("ND"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("OH"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("OK"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("OR"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("PA"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("RI"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("SC"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("SD"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("TN"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("TX"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("UT"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("VT"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("VA"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("WA"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("WV"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("WI"); lbShipToState.Items.Add("WY");
lbShipToState.Location = new System.Drawing.Point(25, 16); lbShipToState.Size = new System.Drawing.Size(90, 330); lbShipToState.SelectionMode = SelectionMode.MultiExtended; grpShipToState.Controls.Add(lbShipToState);
}
private void baseToolbarsManager_ToolClick(object sender, Infragistics.Win.UltraWinToolbars.ToolClickEventArgs args) { //MessageBox.Show("clicked: " + args.Tool.Key);
switch (args.Tool.Key) { case "PrintPreviewTool": case "PrintServerTool": case "PrintClientTool": case "EmailTool": case "GenerateTool": case "ReportDesignModeTool":
//MessageBox.Show("x");
//string strShipToStateList = "("; string strShipToStateList = ""; foreach (string strSelectedState in lbShipToState.SelectedItems) { //MessageBox.Show(str); strShipToStateList += strSelectedState + ","; //strShipToStateList += "'" + strSelectedState + "',"; } if(strShipToStateList.Length > 0) { strShipToStateList = strShipToStateList.Substring(0, strShipToStateList.Length - 1); } //strShipToStateList += ")"; edvReportParam.dataView[edvReportParam.Row]["Character05"] = strShipToStateList;
//MessageBox.Show(strShipToStateList);
/* Control cGroupUltraGrid = csm.GetNativeControlReference("eddf8cb4-cdad-44b2-8766-441432bbc51e-1"); EpiUltraGrid eugGroup = (EpiUltraGrid)cGroupUltraGrid;
string strGroupsSelected = "";
foreach (UltraGridRow row in eugGroup.Rows) { //MessageBox.Show("ProdCode: " + row.Cells["ProdCode"].Value); strGroupsSelected += row.Cells["ProdCode"].Value + ","; } edvReportParam.dataView[edvReportParam.Row]["Character04"] = strGroupsSelected; */
break; }
}
}
